## ðŸš€ Quick start

1. **Set up env**
    Run command
    ```nvm use```

    ```npm config set ignore-scripts false``` // sharp plugin needs to run post-instalation scripts

    ```npm install```

    ```npm config set ignore-scripts true``` // disable npm scripts again

2.  **Use standard gatsby commands and have fun**

    ```gatsby develop```
    ```gatsby build```
    ```gatsby serve```
